alert.note: Alert for Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:27PM EDT until July 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Earlington, or near Madisonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Earlington around 330 PM CDT. Madisonville and Mortons Gap around 335 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 95 and 122. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 43. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 32 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
